title: Candace Owens explains why neither Bad Bunny nor Kid Rock Super Bowl halftime shows felt worth watching
summary_full: Candace Owens criticized both the 2026 Super Bowl halftime shows, rejecting Bad Bunny’s official performance and Turning Point USA’s Kid Rock-led alternative. In a viral post, she said both sides pushed political identity over entertainment. Reports from BBC and UNILAD confirmed details of both events, which sparked wide debate across cultural and political lines.
